name: Ooze, Sinoper
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, prone

actions.name: Paint Splash
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit 5 ft. or range 20/60' one creature. 18 (3d8+5) acid and target is coated in paint. Roll a die. Even result: target is coated in a warm color paint such as red orange or yellow. Odd result: target is coated in a cool color paint such as blue green or purple. A creature including target can use its action to remove the paint.

actions.name: Foment Pigment (Recharge 4–6)
actions.desc: Activates latent magic in its paint burning/freezing paint off creatures affected by Paint Splash. Each creature coated in paint within 60' of it: 35 (10d6) cold (if coated in cool color) or fire (warm color) and poisoned 1 min (DC 16 Con half damage and isn’t poisoned). Each affected creature no longer coated in paint.

special_abilities.name: Amorphous
special_abilities.desc: Move through space 1ft.+ wide with o squeezing.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from that work of art.

special_abilities.name: Ooze Nature
special_abilities.desc: The sinoper ooze doesn’t require sleep.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: Difficult surfaces even ceilings no ability check.
